exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing x : K H : abs x = 0 The term "x" has type "AbsRing.sort K" while it is expected to have type "R".
The reference H1 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros x H. destruct (Rabs_eq_0 x H) as [H1|H2]. - apply AbsRing.ax5 in H1. apply H1. - apply Rabs_Rabsolu in H2. contradiction.
